title: Let’s Cruise Through Tokyo
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Uwaaah~, this is the best~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu, actually, I just found out about this thing recently as well. I thought you might also be interested in it, You-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I am interested, super interested! I can’t believe we can sightsee around Tokyo on a boat!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>I’m glad you’re having fun. Ah, You-chan, we’re going to go under this bridge soon!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Yeah! Alright, we’re going under now~. 3, 2, 1, there, we passed through~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ahaha, you’re so silly, You-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ehehe, cause it’s a ton of fun, you know!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ah, there, that’s Akiba.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Eh!? You can see Akiba from a boat, huh!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu, I thought I’m used to seeing Akiba, but seeing it from a boat feels so fresh♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
